CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 债务；欠款；借款；负债；债券；债权；感激；道义上的义务；欠人情；（对某人的）感恩之情；情义

word_group.brief_definition: 浮动债务；流动债务；短期债务
欠某人人情债；受某人的恩惠
债务问题；存在债务问题

bilingual.source: The debtor should try to avoid defaulting on the debt.
bilingual.target: 债务人应该尽量避免拖欠债务。
她的债务让她非常焦虑。
他通过贷款积累了债务。

bilingual.source: This debt is a burden for him.
bilingual.target: 这笔债务对他来说是个大麻烦。

bilingual.source: This company has a huge amount of debt.

bilingual.target: 他们计划重组他们的债务。

bilingual.source: The company is trying to rid itself of debt.
They are working hard to pay off their debt.
bilingual.target: 他们正在努力偿还债务。

bilingual.source: He struggled for years to pay off his debt.
bilingual.target: 他多年努力偿还他的债务。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold it. What? Say that again. A collateralized debt obligation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，什么？再说一遍。担保债务凭证。

yingyinNormal.en: The IMF wants to help us with the debt relief solution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国际货币基金组织希望帮助我们制定债务免除方案。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, with as much debt as you have, probably not next year either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有这么多债务在身，明年应该也不能去。

yingyinNormal.en: Lucca's right. The debt strike is working. Colosseum stock is falling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢卡说得对，债务罢工生效了，克鲁斯曼的股价正在下跌。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you consider mounds of credit card debt kind of a big deal financially? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你觉得身负大笔信用卡债务算不算重大的财务问题呢？算。

yingyinNormal.en: Bob? What do you want? I want you to lay off of Maggie. Rossum. Rossum. She paid her debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鲍勃？你想要什么？我要你停止骚扰玛姬...罗苏姆。罗苏姆，她已经还清债务了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think so. There's a colorable argument that we crossed a line when we encouraged students not to pay back their debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可不觉得，对方可以争论说当我们鼓励学生们不偿还债务时，存在违法行为。

yingyinNormal.en: And so as President, I'm working to make sure young people like Elizabeth can go to college without racking up mountains of debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为总统，我要确保像伊丽莎白这样的同学能够上得起大学，而且不能背负沉重的债务负担。

yingyinNormal.en: He also has remarkable amount of credit card debt. I thought your dad paid your cards. I have a card for emergencies that I pay for myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且它的信用卡债务数额惊人。不是你爹帮你付的信用卡账单吗？我有一张自己付款的紧急备用卡。

yingyinNormal.en: Just to recap, you're now facing a debt strike which is destroying your not-very-good name, a shareholder suit which could bankrupt you in court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总结一下，你们现在面临的债务罢工正在摧毁你们本就不怎么好的名声，而股东代表诉讼将在法庭上把你们告到破产。

yingyinNormal.en: Calm yourselves. Now listen to me. One of you must win the heart of the prince. Do that, and we can unwind the debt in which we were ensnared when we came to this backwater!
yingyinNormal.zh: 都冷静点，现在听我说，你们中必须要有一人赢得王子的心，那样，我们就能摆脱陷入这泥潭时背上的债务了。

yingyinNormal.en: What payment? Remainder of the debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么款项？ 就是余下的借款。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a debt l'll never be able to repay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这份亏欠我永远也无法弥补。

yingyinNormal.en: America owes you a debt of gratitude, son.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国深深地感谢你，孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: The country owes you a great debt of gratitude.
yingyinNormal.zh: 英国对你们的所作所为深表感激。

yingyinNormal.en: They wind up unemployable and saddled with massive debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们最终无法就业并且还背上了高额的贷款。

yingyinNormal.en: Even though you'd be dragging a debt behind you for 20 years?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不怕今后二十年都欠着一身债吗？

yingyinNormal.en: He never told me about the debt. Or I'd've tried to help him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没跟我提过这笔债，不然我会尽力帮他还的。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I just, I'd never be able to enjoy it. It'd be this giant karmic debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法享受非份之财的乐趣，会有报应的。

yingyinNormal.en: Cade, I am in your debt. My name is Optimus Prime. My Autobots. They're in danger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯德，我欠你一个恩情，我是擎天柱，我的博派伙伴有危险。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Professionals trying to acquire new skills will be able to do so without going into <highlight>debt</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 试图获得新技能的专业人士将能够在不负债的情况下获得新技能。

examination_example.sentence: Students who do not need the extra training could cut their <highlight>debt</highlight> mountain by a third.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不需要额外培训的学生就可以削减他们债务大山的三分之一。

examination_example.sentence: This leaves today's average law-school graduate with $100, 000 of <highlight>debt</highlight> on top of undergraduate debts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得今天的普通法学院毕业生在本科债务的基础上还欠了10万美元的债务。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: something, especially money, that is owed to someone else, or the state of owing something

examination_example.sentence: She had no stable income, $12,000 in credit-card <highlight>debt</highlight> and no plan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她没有稳定的收入，背负着1.2万美元的信用卡债务，也没有任何计划。

examination_example.sentence: The average student's <highlight>debt</highlight> upon graduation now approaches $40, 000, and as college becomes ever more expensive, calls to make it "free" are multiplying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，学生在毕业时的平均负债接近4万美元。上大学变得越来越贵，让它“免费”的呼声越来越高。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: something; especially money; that is owed to someone else; or the state of owing something

examination_example.sentence: But credit cards often seem to be the gateway to <highlight>debt</highlight>-related financial difficulties for many.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对许多人来说，信用卡似乎往往是通往与债务相关的财务困难的大门。

examination_example.sentence: In a considerable percentage of cases of <highlight>debt</highlight>-induced financial stress, credit cards and loans will be a central element.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在相当大比例的债务引发的金融压力案例中，信用卡和贷款将是一个核心要素。

examination_example.sentence: The next common type of financial stress is that caused by <highlight>debt</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下一种常见的财务压力是由债务引起的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: something, especially money, that is owed to someone else, or the state of owing something

examination_example.sentence: New students are now aware that they are likely to leave university up to ￡15, 000 in <highlight>debt</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新生们现在意识到他们离开大学的债务可能高达15000英镑。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: something, especially money, that is owed to someone else, or the state of owing something

examination_example.sentence: We were busy having fun，and charged（支付）everything to my credit cards instead，but then I began to realize how much in <highlight>debt</highlight>(负债)I was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们忙着玩，把所有的钱都记在我的信用卡上，但后来我开始意识到我欠了很多债。
